ERROR.FILE_SIZE: File size must be less than {{val}}
ERROR.PASSWORD_PATTERN: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number!
ERROR.PASSWORD_THE_SAME: New password must be different from current password!
ERROR.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address!
ERROR.DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your device does not support this feature!
ERROR.NO_ACCESS_MEDIA: Unable to access your camera or microphone!
ERROR.FILE_TOO_LARGE_OR_NOT_SUPPORT: File too large or not supported!
ERROR.CONTENT_TOO_LARGE: Content is too large to translate!
ERROR.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORT_SPEAKER: Your browser does not support speaker settings!
ERROR.NOT_ALLOW_CAMERA: You have not allowed access to the camera!
ERROR.NOT_ALLOW_MICROPHONE: You have not allowed access to the microphone!
ERROR.USERNAME_MIN: Username must be at least 3 characters!
ERROR.USERNAME_MAX: Username must be at most 15 characters!
ERROR.USERNAME_PATTERN: Username must contain only letters, numbers, and underscores!
ERROR.NOT_SUPPORT_PREVIEW:
File too large or not supported for preview!
Please download to view.

SUCCESS.PROFILE_UPDATED: Your profile has been successfully updated!
SUCCESS.AVATAR_UPDATED: Your avatar has been successfully updated!
SUCCESS.CHANGE_PASSWORD: Your password has been successfully changed
SUCCESS.RESEND_EMAIL: A new verification link has been sent to your email!

TRANSLATION.PHRASES_DESCRIPTION: Here, you can select phrases for this situation. Or you can save your favorite phrases in the 'My List' tab.

SIGN_UP.TITLE: Sign Up
SIGN_UP.PASSWORD_DES: Minimum 8 characters, including at least 1 uppercase letter

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot Password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: We will send a link to your email to help you reset your password

RESET_PASSWORD_SENDED.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET_PASSWORD_SENDED.MESSAGE: A reset password link has been sent to {{email}}. If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder

SIGN_UP_SUCCESS.TITLE: Verify Your Email Address
SIGN_UP_SUCCESS.MESSAGE:
A link has been sent to {{email}}. Verify this email address to complete registration.

If you don't see the email, check your spam folder or click the button below to resend the email.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Verification Successful
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in with the registered email to use all the features of Middo.

EXPIRED.TITLE: Verification Link Expired
EXPIRED.MESSAGE: Your email verification link has expired. Please sign up again to receive a new verification link.

BLOCKED.MESSAGE: Currently, you can not reply to this conversation.

CONVERSATION.WELCOME_CONTENT: Start a conversation with your team or group. You can also create a group chat to discuss and share files.
CONVERSATION.TITLE: Conversation
CONVERSATION.PICK_MESSAGE: Pick a conversation to start chatting
CONVERSATION.CONTENT_DISCUSSION_CALL: All messages, files, and links sent in this discussion will be saved in the group chat. Members can access them even after the meeting ends.
CONVERSATION.CAPTION: Caption
CONVERSATION.NOTICE_CONTENT: Members in the group will not receive notifications about this call until you invite them to join.
CONVERSATION.TRANSLATE_TOOL_OFF: Translate tool is off, you can turn it back on in
CONVERSATION.EMPTY_WELCOME_ITEM_1_DESCRIPTION: All-in-one conversation platform that integrated Middo translation that could help you have unlimited connections with everyone around the world.
CONVERSATION.EMPTY_WELCOME_ITEM_2_DESCRIPTION: Middo Call is one of the most fantastic feature of Middo Conversation that could support your work more easily.
CONVERSATION.EMPTY_WELCOME_ITEM_3_DESCRIPTION: Translate tool can help you rise the accuracy of your message in conversation.

NOTIFICATION.WITHOUT_NOTIFICATIONS: Are you sure? Without notifications, communicating with your team will be much more difficult.

SIGN_OUT.TITLE: Do you want to sign out?
SIGN_OUT.DESCRIPTION: You will be signed out of the app and need to log in again.

DELETE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Delete Account
DELETE_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: You will lose all your data and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete your account?

SHARE_SCREEN.TITLE: Share Screen
SHARE_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: This app will be able to view the contents of your screen.

LEAVE_CALL.TITLE: Leave Call
LEAVE_CALL.DESCRIPTION: You will leave this call and others will continue. Are you sure you want to leave?

REQUEST_JOIN_ROOM.TITLE: {{name}} wants to join this call
REQUEST_JOIN_ROOM.DESCRIPTION: This user is not in this call. Do you want to allow this user to join?

STOP_DOODLE.TITLE: Stop Doodle
STOP_DOODLE.DESCRIPTION: What others have drawn will be erased. Are you sure you want to stop doodling?

CLEAR_DOODLE.TITLE: Clear Doodle?
CLEAR_DOODLE.DESCRIPTION: Your doodle will be erased and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to clear the doodle?

SWITCH_ROOM.TITLE: Switch Room
SWITCH_ROOM.DESCRIPTION: Will you move to another meeting room?

DELETE_CONVERSATION.TITLE: Delete Conversation
DELETE_CONVERSATION.DESCRIPTION: You will lose all your messages and files. Others can still view your messages. Are you sure you want to delete?

LEAVE_GROUP.TITLE: Leave Group
LEAVE_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: You will no longer be able to view messages from this group. Are you sure you want to leave?

SUCCESS.TITLE: Verification Successful
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in with the registered email to use all the features of Middo.

EXPIRED.TITLE: Verification Link Expired
EXPIRED.MESSAGE: Your email verification link has expired. Please sign up again to receive a new verification link.

LEAVE_ROOM.TITLE: Leave Room
LEAVE_ROOM.DESCRIPTION: You will no longer be able to view messages from this room. Are you sure you want to leave?

ON.TITLE: Turn On Notifications
ON.DESCRIPTION: You will receive notifications when there are new messages

OFF.TITLE: Turn Off Notifications
OFF.DESCRIPTION: You will not receive notifications when there are new messages

FOR_YOU.TITLE: For You
FOR_YOU.DESCRIPTION: This message will be removed on your end. Others in this conversation can still view it.

FOR_ALL.TITLE: For Everyone
FOR_ALL.DESCRIPTION: This message will be removed for everyone in this conversation. The message may have already been seen or forwarded. Removed messages may still be reported.

DESKTOP_LOGIN.DESCRIPTION_LOADING: Please wait a moment, we are redirecting you to the login page
DESKTOP_LOGIN.DESCRIPTION_LOGIN_SUCCESS: Click the button below to open the app

INBOX_EMPTY.TIP_DESCRIPTION: You can search for a person or a group by typing person's mail, person's name or groups' name
INBOX_EMPTY.TITLE: Currently you don't have any conversation
INBOX_EMPTY.DESCRIPTION: Start a new conversation to display conversation here:
INBOX_EMPTY.LIST_ITEM_2: Enter email of the person you want to start conversation or create a group
INBOX_EMPTY.TIP_DESCRIPTION_GROUP: Group is a conversation which has at least 3 members
INBOX_EMPTY.TITLE_GROUP: Currently, you have no Group Conversation
INBOX_EMPTY.DESCRIPTION_GROUP: Click button below to create a new one or ask Administrator of a Group Conversation add you in

OFFLINE.TITLE: You're offline
OFFLINE.DESCRIPTION: Please connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile network, check your internet connection or restart your device if need

404.TITLE: Page not found
404.DESCRIPTION: We can't find the page you're looking for
